Title: Lecture Circuit (1)
Plot: Michael goes on a speaking tour of the other branches to explain Scranton's relative success, accompanied by his driver, Pam. Back at the office, Dwight and Jim - now heads of the party planning committee - forget a birthday, with severe consequences. Meanwhile, Andy falls for someone he should not.
GuestStars: Rashida Jones, Adam Jamal Craig, Erica Tazel, Brian Patrick Mulligan
